# Pull Request Template

## Description

Please provide a concise description of the changes introduced in this pull request. What problem does it solve? What new feature does it add?

## Type of Change

*   [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
*   [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
*   [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
*   [ ] Documentation update
*   [ ] Refactor
*   [ ] Chore

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING](https://github.com/chirag127/InkWell-Note-Taking-Mobile-App/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines.
- [ ] My code follows the code style and conventions of this project.
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works.
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if necessary).
- [ ] All new and existing unit tests pass.
- [ ] I have reviewed the [AI Agent Directives](https://github.com/chirag127/InkWell-Note-Taking-Mobile-App/blob/main/AGENTS.md) and ensured compliance.

## Related Issues

Closes #
References #

## Additional Information

Any other context about the pull request, such as screenshots, dependencies, or deployment notes.
